[Falcon's Cloud Ltd](https://www.falconscloud.co.uk/)
===========
Falcon's Cloud Ltd is a registered business in the United Kingdom that aims to provide affordable Virtual Machines with simplicity and excellent customer support.

## Technical Features
* Solid State Storage
* KVM Virtualisation
* Located in London, England
* DDoS Mitigation
* Up to 1Gbps connection  

---
Black Friday Deal!
--
Use code: **BLACKFRIDAY** for **25% OFF** the first month, applies to all of our VPS plans.
Offer ends November 30th 2018.

---

Hummingbird
========
* 1 vCore
* 512MB RAM
* 6GB SSD Storage
* Unlimited Traffic (Limited to 1Gbps, guaranteed 250Mbps)
* 1 IPv4 Address

**£1.42 GBP ~ $1.81 USD** - First month price with code: **BLACKFRIDAY**
[**£1.89 GBP ~ $2.40 USD /Month**](https://falcons.cloud/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)

---

Blackbird
======
* 1 vCore
* 1GB RAM
* 16GB SSD Storage
* Unlimited Traffic (Limited to 1Gbps, guaranteed 250Mbps)
* 1 IPv4 Address

**£2.39 GBP ~ $3.05 USD** - First month price with code: **BLACKFRIDAY**
[**£3.19 GBP ~ $4.05 USD /Month**](https://falcons.cloud/cart.php?a=add&pid=11)

---

## Operating Systems
* CentOS 7 (64 bit)
* CentOS 6 (64 bit)
* Debain 9 (64 bit)
* Ubuntu 18.04.1 (64 bit)
* Fedora Server (64 bit)
More are available upon request.
